attributes.action: Scrap the Private Members Bill for Registering Off Road Motorcycles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Graham Stringer MP for Blackley Manchester, (labour), has introduced his ‘off road vehicles, (registration) bill by way of a private members bill.
I now ask that this government scraps this bill as there is ample police powers to deal with the illegal use of any form of motorcycle whether it be a mini moto, off road scrambler etc.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
